flawed_nl_solution:
After losing some socks, Caroline has 40 - 4 = <<40-4=39>>39 pairs of socks
Caroline donates 39 * (2/3) = <<39*2/3=26>>26 pairs of socks to the thrift store
After donating some socks, Caroline has 39 - 26 = <<39-26=13>>13 pairs of socks remaining
After getting new socks, Caroline has 13 + 10 + 3 = <<13+10+3=26>>26 pairs of socks
#### 26

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 39. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
